Texts.Eng: A Covenant flag. I can bookmark its location so my teleporter can return me here at any time.
A Covenant flag. I can save its location for my teleporter, allowing me to return here later.
A Covenant flag. I can use this as a waypoint for teleportation.
A locator module inside this Covenant flag allows my ship's teleporter to bookmark this location.
A small locator module attached to this Covenant flag allows it to be bookmarked for teleportation.
Covenant flag makess good point to teleport back to ussing teleporter!
Covenant flag. Detected locator module. Ship teleportation system can lock on to this location.
Flag of Covenant-Kel'chis. Akki long for home...
I can bookmark this Covenant flag for quick teleportin'.
The Covenant flag. My ship's teleporter can sync with its location so I can return here later.
The Covenant flag. The ship's teleporter can lock on to the locator module inside it, so I can return here later.
The flag of the Covenant people. My teleporter can bookmark its location for later use.
The flag of the Covenant. I can save its location and return to it later using my teleporter.
The flag of the Kel'chis Covenant. Use ^green;[E]^white; to bookmark a teleportation location.
This Covenant flag can act as a way point, enabling me to return to this point using a teleporter.
This Covenant flag can be bookmarked as a destination for my ship teleporter.
This Covenant flag can be saved as a location for my teleporter. Then I can return to it any time.
